attributes.action: Give Ukraine Weapon to Defend Their Sky: Help Ukraine save World from Extinction
attributes.additional_details:
Ukrainians fight fearlessly and heroically, but all their heroism is wiped off by heavy bombardment and shelling taking thousands of innocent lives and destroying hundreds of homes daily. Realise that no one, no matter how brave they are, can fight against bombs and missiles unless they have proper Air Defence weapon.
Now we have UNIQUE opportunity to win the war and save the world due to brave Ukrainian people – give Ukraine the most advanced Air Defence weapon to defend their sky – Military aircrafts, S-400 – save OUR lives and give humanity chance to Survive.  
Do this TODAY – until it’s too late.
attributes.background: Ukraine’s now fighting for the whole WORLD – for our freedom and independence. This attack on the whole nation and imminent threat to the whole world must be stopped immediately and the best air defence systems must be given to Ukraine to save lives and prevent devastating destructions.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Pledge any necessary military support to defend Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/607314

Seek to impose a no-fly zone over Ukraine: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/609437
